name: PIN: 27 (node.pin=0, not editable through UI)
info:
This node points to PIN 27 (BCM GPIO 0), 
which is disabled in the `pi-gpiod` UI.

In order to re-set the pin value to 0, 
if changed, it's advisable to export 
the node and reimport it after modifying 
the `pin` value in the JSON block.
